A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yikes this movie was a mess. There was to many plot lines that were squeezed in\, all former characterization was thrown out the window\, there were unnecessary plot points\, characters who were given extremely underwhelming stories\, and it didn't feel like a star wars movie at all. This move may have been alright had it not taken place in the middle of a trilogy and was some tandom star wars movie. To be honest\, this movie was extremely disappointing and did very little to redeem itself.
